TextLibrary.Text: I've heard there is a tournament being held in orbit right here.
I've heard there is a tournament being held in orbit right here.
I know, I already had us registered.
I know, I already had us registered.
You must have heard that it isn't just fights to the death. These are unusual matches for the Vortraag. Their aim is to see who is Vortraag enough for something.
You must have heard that it isn't just fights to the death. These are unusual matches for the Vortraag. Their aim is to see who is Vortraag enough for something.
It is because they are giving away a Psi-Weapon. That is why I signed us up and that's why they are wanting a capable Vortraag-like warrior to win.
It is because they are giving away a Psi-Weapon. That is why I signed us up and that's why they are wanting a capable Vortraag-like warrior to win.
*Checks a display* Huh, it looks like they've already found you your first opponent. Some woman named Erin. I don't know anything about her. She must not be very remarkable.
*Checks a display* Huh, it looks like they've already found you your first opponent. Some woman named Erin. I don't know anything about her. She must not be very remarkable.
Alright, I'll head out to the first round then.
That's pretty arrogant, assuming that if YOU don't know who she is that she isn't remarkable. In any event, I'll head out to the first round.
